actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the manufacturers excise tax parts and accessories used on local transit buses, and tires, inner tubes, and tread rubber used on such buses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt buses used in local transit systems from the excise taxes on buses, tires, inner tubes and tread rubber.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the manufacturers excise tax parts and accessories used on local transit buses, and tires, inner tubes, and tread rubber used on such buses.
